text: .  We may use the information you provide during registration with us to monitor the proper usage of our Website, including detecting, investigating and preventing activities that may violate our policies or applicable laws.

We may collect, through automatic data collection technologies, certain information about your equipment, IP addresses, browsing actions and patterns to improve our Site and deliver a better and more personalized service.

Our Website may automatically collect Non- PII, including the web page from which a visitor enters our Website, which pages a visitor visits on our Website, and how much time a visitor spends on each page, etc.

This Privacy Notice discloses the practices of NWN Corporation and Carousel Industries of North America, LLC (collectively, "NWN Carousel" or "we") concerning information we obtain by and through your use of the NWN Carousel websites (collectively, the "Website") and our technology solutions (collectively, the "Services").  When we process information about you that was collected from our Website, we are typically acting as a data controller- meaning NWN Carousel determines how and why the information is being processed.

Privacy Policy

5. How Long We Keep Your Personal Information
Privacy Policy

Topics: How Long We Keep Your Personal Information
When we collect information about you through your use of our Services, the lawful basis on which we process your personal information is because it is necessary to perform contractual obligations to you or our Clients (i.e. processing the data is necessary in order for us to provide you or our Clients with Services).  In addition, we may process your personal information in order to comply with our legal and regulatory obligations, resolve disputes, enforce our agreements and for the establishment, exercise or defense of legal claims.

This Privacy Notice discloses the practices of NWN Corporation and Carousel Industries of North America, LLC (collectively, "NWN Carousel" or "we") concerning information we obtain by and through your use of the NWN Carousel websites (collectively, the "Website") and our technology solutions (collectively, the "Services").  When we process information about you that was collected from our Website, we are typically acting as a data controller- meaning NWN Carousel determines how and why the information is being processed.
